text: aur (tumhaaree to ye haalat thee ki) tum log is khyaal se (apane gunaahon kee) parda daaree bhee to nahin karate the ki tumhaare kaan aur tumhaaree onkhe aur tumhaare aaza tumhaare barakhilaaph gavaahee denge balki tum is khyaal me (bhoole hue) the ki khuda ko tumhaare bahut se kaamon kee khabar hee nahin
